greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Square of second longest side of triangles with sides whose squares are integers and with positive integer area, ordered by longest side, then second longest side and finally shortest side.
example: a(6)=8 since the triangle with sides sqrt(9), sqrt(8) and sqrt(5) has area 3.
results.author: _Henry Bottomley_, May 07 2002
